show.title: Kana Kaanum Kaalangal
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/vvchTB
show.description: A naive village youth arrives in Chennai with dreams of a better life, only to face the harsh realities and hidden charms of the bustling city, guided by an unlikely friendship and surprising encounters.
show.description_secondary: A naive village youth arrives in Chennai with dreams of a better life, only to face the harsh realities and hidden charms of the bustling city, guided by an unlikely friendship and surprising encounters.
